# arangodb Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "arangodb" {
  endpoint = "https://localhost:8529"
  username = "username"
  password = "password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) Endpoint url
- `username` (String) Username

### Optional

- `password` (String) Password
- `tls` (Boolean) Enable TLS, defaults to true
